text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Dwelling" means a building or part of a building that provides living or sleeping facilities for one or more individuals.
"Dwelling" includes a one or two family dwelling, multifamily dwelling, hotel, motel, or dormitory.

text.section:
"Install" means to attach to the wall or ceiling of a dwelling in accordance with:
the National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) 720 standard for the installation of carbon monoxide warning equipment in dwelling units; and
the manufacturer's recommendations.
